trans-unit.source: Establishes the common events and also the event-related properties and methods for basic input processing by Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.
trans-unit.target: 透過 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目建立一般事件，以及與事件相關的屬性和用以處理基本輸入的方法。

trans-unit.source: Although this interface is public, it is not intended to be implemented in application or framework-building scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個介面是公用的但它不是應用程式或架構建置案例中實作。

trans-unit.source: This interface is public because of the inheritance requirements for connecting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面是公用的因為連線的繼承需求[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]至核心[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]架構。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this interface as a casting mechanism to enforce that the input events and properties will come from either a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>, which can be handled in the same input model.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用轉型機制為這個介面，以強制執行輸入的事件和屬性，將來自於 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>，但可以處理相同的輸入模型中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [WPF Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md) and also see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md)，另請參閱[基底項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the routed event that is being handled.
trans-unit.target: 要處理之路由事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式實作的參考。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specific routed event to an element.
trans-unit.target: 將特定路由事件的路由事件處理常式加入項目中。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the mouse to this element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試強制將滑鼠的捕捉給這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse is successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕捉到滑鼠則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the stylus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試強制將手寫筆的捕捉給這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕捉到手寫筆則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to focus the keyboard on this element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將鍵盤的焦點放在這個項目上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard focus is moved to this element or already was on this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果鍵盤焦點移至這個項目上，或早已在此項目上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus can be set to this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出焦點可否設在這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can have focus set to it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可將焦點設定到此項目上則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 元素擷取滑鼠時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, that element receives mouse input even if the cursor is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當項目捕捉滑鼠時，該項目會收到滑鼠輸入，即使資料指標位於其範圍外。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取以這種方式，並保留擷取，直到拖放作業的拖放動作發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element captures the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 元素擷取手寫筆時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, that element receives stylus input even if the cursor is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當項目擷取手寫筆時，該元素會收到手寫筆輸入，即使資料指標位於其範圍外。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations, and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆只在拖放作業時，通常擷取以這種方式，而且會保留擷取拖放作業的拖放動作發生之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element is enabled in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示這個項目是否已在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中啟用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用該項目則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) make this property read/write and establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 進行讀取/寫入，並建立此屬性為相依性屬性的這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個項目是否具有鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目具有鍵盤焦點則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether keyboard focus is anywhere inside the element bounds, including if keyboard focus is inside the bounds of any visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出鍵盤焦點是否在項目範圍內的任何位置，包括鍵盤焦點是否在任何視覺子項目的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard focus is on the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果鍵盤焦點在項目或其子項目上則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the mouse is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否將滑鼠擷取至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has mouse capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已具有滑鼠捕捉則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the mouse pointer is over this element in the strictest hit testing sense.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，該值表示滑鼠指標在最嚴格的點擊測試意義上，是否在這個項目上方。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse pointer is over this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠指標位於這個項目上方則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the mouse pointer is located over this element (including visual children elements that are inside its bounds).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示滑鼠指標是否位在這個項目上方 (包括其範圍內的視覺子項目)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse pointer is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠指標位於項目或其子項目上方則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否將手寫筆擷取至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has stylus capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已具有手寫筆捕捉則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is over this element in the strictest hit testing sense.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，該值表示手寫筆在最嚴格的點擊測試意義上，是否在這個項目上方。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is over the element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果手寫筆位於項目上方則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusDirectlyOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is located over this element (or over visual child elements that are inside its bounds).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示手寫筆是否位在這個項目上方 (或其範圍內的視覺子項目上方)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus cursor is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果手寫筆游標位於項目或其子項目上方則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Some core classes that implement <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, also implement an event that tracks changes to this property.
trans-unit.target: 某些核心類別可實作<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，也會實作這個屬性會追蹤變更的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, this interface does not include such an event as part of its contract.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這個介面不包含這類事件，為其合約的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) establish this property as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點且按下按鍵時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released while the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點且放開按鍵時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the keyboard is no longer focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤不再以此元素為焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 此元素失去滑鼠擷取時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the cursor is outside its borders.
trans-unit.target: 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使資料指標位於其框線外。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses stylus capture.
trans-unit.target: 此元素失去手寫筆擷取時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the cursor is outside its borders.
trans-unit.target: 當項目擷取手寫筆時，即使資料指標位於其框線外接收手寫筆輸入。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標進入此元素的邊界時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標離開此元素的邊界時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus button is pressed down while the stylus is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 當手寫筆位於這個項目上方而使用者按下手寫筆按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.target: 當手寫筆位於這個項目上方而使用者放開手寫筆按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus touches the digitizer while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆在此項目上方且碰觸數位板時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus moves over an element, but without touching the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆在項目上方移動，但沒有碰觸數位板時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus is close enough to the digitizer to be detected.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆靠近數位板而被偵測到時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus moves while the stylus is over the element.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆在元素上方且移動手寫筆時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus is too far from the digitizer to be detected.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆遠離數位板而無法被偵測到時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of several stylus gestures are detected, for example, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Tap" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Drag" />.
trans-unit.target: 在偵測到其中一個手寫筆筆勢時發生，例如 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Tap" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Drag" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus is raised off the digitizer while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆在這個項目上方且離開數位板時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.
trans-unit.target: 此元素以一種與裝置無關的方式取得文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> class that contains the identifier for the event to raise.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> 類別的執行個體，其中包含要引發之事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the routed event that is specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> property within the provided <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 引發由所提供之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> 內的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> 屬性所指定的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Releases the mouse capture, if this element holds the capture.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目保有滑鼠捕捉，則釋放捕捉。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Releases the stylus capture, if this element holds the capture.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目保有手寫筆捕捉，則釋放捕捉。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.
trans-unit.target: 附加處理常式之路由事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The specific handler implementation to remove from this element's event handler collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從這個項目的事件處理常式集合中移除的特定處理常式實作。

trans-unit.source: Removes all instances of the specified routed event handler from this element.
trans-unit.target: 移除這個項目中所指定路由事件處理常式的所有執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus button is pressed while the stylus is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 當手寫筆位於這個項目上方而使用者按下手寫筆按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.

trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus is close enough to the digitizer to be detected.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆靠近數位板而被偵測到時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus cursor leaves the bounds of the element.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆游標離開元素的邊界時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus cursor moves over the element.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆游標在元素上方移動時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus is too far from the digitizer to be detected.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆遠離數位板而無法被偵測到時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of several stylus gestures are detected, for example, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Tap" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Drag" />.
trans-unit.target: 在偵測到其中一個手寫筆筆勢時發生，例如 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Tap" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Drag" />。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the stylus is raised off the digitizer while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆在這個項目上方且離開數位板時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.
trans-unit.target: 此元素以一種與裝置無關的方式取得文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: This interface is not intended for public implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不是公用的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>介面。
